column6:
The book that all smart and good-looking people buy! Want to be smart and good-looking? BUY THIS BOOK! It's more important to the Marvel Universe than CIVIL WAR! I swear! Cross my heart, and such!,2006,11
32 PGS./Parental Advisory ...$2.99
